plot: In 1866, a group of Christians from Maine under the leadership of the charismatic Reverend George Jones Adams sailed to the Holy Land in order to prepare for the second coming of Christ.
title: To Brave a Dream
plot_es: In 1866, a group of Christians from Maine under the leadership of the charismatic Reverend George Jones Adams sailed to the Holy Land in order to prepare for the second coming of Christ.
